oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Structural characterization and reactivity of Cu(II) complex of p-tert-butyl-calix[4]arene bearing two imine pendants at lower rim
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DEY, MISHTU
RAO, CHEBROLU P
GUIONNEAU, PHILIPPE
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystal structure
crystallography
molecular structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cu(II) complex of the double-armed p-tert-butylcalix[4]arene conjugate possessing imine functionality at the lower rim was synthesized and was characterized by analytical, spectral and crystallographic methods and its catecholase activity was evaluated.
